description: Try our easy to follow Baked Sausages With Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage dishes,Sausage,Roast,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Beef,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Peanut free
name: Baked Sausages With Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Put potato in a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over a high heat, then reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes or until just tender. Drain and cool.
Place sausages and potato into a large roasting pan with capsicum and olives. Drizzle with oil. Roast for 40 minutes or until sausages and potato are golden and cooked through. Keep warm.
To make the gravy, drain the juices from the sausages into a small pan. Add butter and melt over medium heat. Sprinkle over the flour and whisk to combine. Cook for 1 minute.

Slowly add the beef stock to the pan, whisking constantly until combined. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 2 minutes. Strain through a fine sieve and serve with sausages and vegetables.
